::Stratus::

"Um, its this," Stratus says, issuing the command to trasform into 
his beast mode. In a few seconds, there was a great white shark 
laying inside Motormaster's trailer. Stratus opens his mouth to say 
something, realizing that he couldn't breathe. His organic mode 
needed oxygen!

Stratus's fins flap, trying to get some oxygen into his gills, but 
there was no water around. In several seconds Stratus transforms into 
his robot mode, breathing heavily.

"That," he says, cursing water creatures under his breath, "I don't 
know what those are called."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Motormaster dosent bother to wait, as he closes the trailor door, 
and sets
> off towards the other shuttle. "So, what's your alternate mode?" he
> inquires to his passenger, through his speakers in his trailer.
